EmptyShell.Name: index.html
EmptyShell.Title: index.html
EmptyShell.ESContent:
• photos/000621DesNews_BYU-Idaho.jpg

    President Hinckley announces that Ricks College will become BYU-Idaho.

  • photos/090302StudentLife-mtg_28.jpg

    Students meet to discuss the Student Living Program.

  • photos/090511Accounting_38.jpg

    Students take notes during an accounting class taught by Don Campbell.

  • photos/090518Religion_79.jpg

    Philip Allred leads an Old Testament class.

  • photos/090629campus-students_10.jpg

    Students on campus between classes during fall semester.

  • photos/100415LearningModel_128.jpg

    Students study together for a class.

  • photos/100506Found-GlobalHotspots_02.jpg

    Brian Felt teaches a Foundations class about global hotspots.

  • photos/100507KendallBaron_4.jpg

    Student Kendall Baron studies in The Crossroads.

  • photos/100608_Ushers_25.jpg

    Whitney Nebeker and Abigail Tucker stand as ushers during the weekly campus devotional.

  • photos/100609MaryHaggard_10.jpg

    Student Mary Haggard reads her scriptures on the Spori quad.

  • photos/100623campusStudents_02.jpg

    Students walk between the Thomas E. Ricks and Gordon B. Hinckley Buildings between classes.

  • photos/A-090529Palasades_035.jpg

    An Outdoor Activities backpacking trip to Palisades Creek.

  • photos/A-090926teewinotclimb02.jpg

    A group of students in a mountaineering class climb Teewinot Mountain in the Tetons.

  • photos/A-091023RackingLeaves_30.jpg

    A Service Activities project. Students rake leaves for Guinevere and Homer Taylor.

  • photos/A-091112_WeightRoom012.jpg

    Fitness Activities offers personal trainers at no charge to students. Here, trainer Jared Antczak helps student Chris Latin.

  • photos/A-091119ImpromptuDance_16.jpg

    What started out as an announcement for a Talent Activities showcase turned into an impromptu dance on the stage in The Crossroads.

  • photos/A-100227GuitarsUnplugged_001.jpg

    Students perform at the Best of Guitars Unplugged show last winter semester.

  • photos/A-100304HiLoAerboics_132.jpg

    Student Laura Warren teaches a Fitness Activities workshop in hI-lo aerobics.

  • photos/A-100306GrandPianos_199.jpg

    Student performers participate in Grand Pianos Live. Students perform songs they've written and/or learned.

  • photos/A-100611TrackField_15.jpg

    High jumper Jimmy Hancock participates in a track meet.

  • photos/A-100619_ServiceProj_23.jpg

    Students participate in service projects during Spirit Week activities. Here, students tie blankets and write letters.

  • photos/A-100626_Cheerleading_020.jpg

    Cheerleaders participate in the basketball finals, part of the Activities Program at BYU-Idaho.

  • photos/A-100626_MensBasketball_073.jpg

    Students participate in the basketball finals, part of the Activities Program at BYU-Idaho.

  • photos/A-100908I-Night_069.jpg

    A student rides a mechanical bull at I-Night.

  • photos/BYU-I_10th_Anniversary.jpg

    Thousands of students gather on the BYU-Idaho Stadium field to form "BYU-I" as part of BYU-Idaho's 10-year anniversary.

  • photos/C-020422_1686MultiUseBldg.jpg

    Construction of the Gordon B. Hinckley Building in April 2002.

  • photos/C-080715ConstructionChoir_12.jpg

    President Clark at the BYU-Idaho Center construction site in 2008.

  • photos/C-090427MCConst_10.jpg

    Construction progress on the Hyrum Manwaring Student Center (May 2009).

  • photos/C-091125AuditoriumConst_79.jpg

    Construction progress on the BYU-Idaho Center (Nov. 2009).

  • photos/C-100609McKayBldg_01.jpg

    Construction progress on the skywalk between the Manwaring Center and the McKay Library (June 2010).

  • photos/C-100824_MCconstruction_09.jpg

    Construction progress on the west side of the Manwaring Student Center (Aug. 2010).

  • photos/C-100824_MCconstruction_13.jpg

    Construction progress on Legacy Hall inside the Manwaring Student Center. Legacy Hall will adjoin the David O. McKay Library via an enclosed pedestrian skywalk (Aug. 2010).

  • photos/C-100824_MCconstruction_24.jpg

    Construction progress inside of the pedestrian skywalk that will connect the Manwaring Student Center to the Library (Aug. 2010).

  • photos/C-100824Auditorium.jpg

    A view from the mezzanine seating level of the BYU-Idaho Center's auditorium.

  • photos/C-100824Auditorium_005.jpg

    Construction progress inside of the BYU-Idaho Center. This portion of the building will be the multi-use area, containing room for 10 divided sport courts, which may be used for a variety of activities (Aug. 2010).

  • photos/C-100824Auditorium_104.jpg

    Construction progress on the exterior of the BYU-Idaho Center. The building is set to open in January.

  • photos/C-100824Auditorium_pan.jpg

    A panoramic view of the 15,000 seats being installed inside the BYU-Idaho Center's auditorium.

  • photos/C-100901SkywalkConst_1.jpg

    Construction progress on pedestrian skywalk connecting the Manwaring Student Center to the Library.
